item.title: Building a Lexical Analyzer and SLR Parser in Java
item.description: Introduction In the realm of compiler design, two crucial components stand out: the Lexical Analyzer and the Parser. This project dives deep into implementing both, using Java as our weapon of choice. Let’s embark on this journey of transforming raw code into meaningful structures! Part 1: The Lexical Analyzer What is a Lexical Analyzer? A lexical analyzer, often called a scanner or tokenizer, is the first phase of a compiler.
